sentences.en: As the flimsy constructs soared, the men paid out twine until the kites reached three or four thousand feet.
sentences.cn: 随着这轻薄的东西向上飞升，这些人慢慢放出细绳，直到风筝飞到三四千英尺高。

sentences.cn: 他胖乎乎的双臂搂住文森特的脖子。

sentences.cn: 菲律宾的一种植物,出产用于制作粗麻绳的坚硬的纤维.

sentences.en: The vines twine about the frame and form a shade.

sentences.en: Their cardboard boxes were wrapped and tied neatly with waxed twine.

sentences.en: These strands of molecules twine around each other to form cable-like structures.
sentences.cn: 这些分子链彼此缠绕，形成缆线状的结构。

sentences.en: They were all separated by month, tightly bundled in aged cotton twine.
sentences.cn: 它们都按月分开了, 用陈年的棉布帆线紧紧地捆扎在一起.

sentences.en: They're intertwined like balls of loose twine.

words.tran_cn: 搓绳机；缠绕植物；[纺] 走锭捻线机

trans.tran_cn: 盘绕，麻线，捻，缠绕在一起的东西
trans.tran_en: strong string made by twisting together two or more threads or strings

trans.tran_cn: 缠绕， 盘绕， 围绕
trans.tran_en: to wind or twist around something else, or to make something do this
